resources.string: Help us make this app better
Appndroid is an independent group of enthusiastic developers.
Our objective is to develop apps for different sports events,besides that we are also working on developing business applications.
Previously we have developed cricketing apps like IPL Twenty 12 & T20 world cup 2012. We have also recently launched a Formula 1 application named F1 2013
This is an update release for IPl 2013 which contains just the schedule,Match results, Points table, Orange & Purple cap standings & Teams details along with their squads for IPL 2013
Please check for the updates for Live score.
Check out IPL 2013 for complete information on IPL 2013
